archiefmat.titel: Memories van toelichting bij de statistische opgaven van de districtscommissarissen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Explanatory notes of statistical information drawn up by the District Commissioners
archiefmat.scope: Contains statistical information regarding numbers of plantations, production, population (biths and deaths), religion, criminality, punishments, education, etc. sent in from the various districts.
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version.
